title: Is there an invention that could have been invented much earlier, or do inventions occur as soon as circumstances allow? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many examples of inventions that rely on either simple ideas(think of the paperclip) or on principles discovered long before the invention.  The first that came to my mind is the steam engine.  Toys relying on the pressure from steam date back to the age of the Greeks.  The real driving forces are the need to solve a problem and the imagination of a creative mind.
The voltaic pile (an early battery) by A Volta in about 1799. Perhaps the Leyden jar.
